name: VR Zoo Home: Mixed Reality MetaQuest2/Pro
name_original: VR Zoo Home: Mixed Reality MetaQuest2/Pro
description:
VR Oculus Quest2, MetaQuestPro

oculus Applab link (hand tracking is enabled, activate in device settings, grab animals with pinching)

https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5583019775107608/

Created a Zoo in your home with over 60 animals!

- pass through enabled to see animals in your actual surroundings in mixed reality

- hand tracking enabled to allow hand placement of animals (controllers work as well)

- animals are placeable and moveable with random spawn options and deletion options

- variety of pre-made and customizable animal placements:

-- full sized animals

-- half sized animals

-- tabletop sized animals

Additional gameplay (use outside on your own risk)

https://youtu.be/xVV8O04rWpk

https://youtu.be/tqEMdaID-RQ

https://youtu.be/zqs-DA8X4tc

terms and conditions and privacy policy at www.zosustudio.com
